meanings.definition: The act of synchronizing audio with video after filming.
meanings.sent1: Postsyncing is important to make sure the voices match the movements in the movie.
meanings.sent2: In post-production, postsyncing is done to align the sound with the visuals.
meanings.sent3: The postsyncing process can be tedious but results in a seamless viewing experience.
meanings.sent4: Postsyncing is like putting together a puzzle to make the film complete.
meanings.sent5: The postsyncing work was so precise that you couldn't tell it was done after filming.

meanings.definition: The process of adjusting the timing of sound effects in a film or video.
meanings.sent1: During postsyncing, the sound effects are carefully timed to match the action on screen.
meanings.sent2: Postsyncing ensures that the audience hears the right sound effects at the right moment.
meanings.sent3: The postsyncing stage is where the magic of sound effects truly comes to life.
meanings.sent4: Postsyncing is like conducting an orchestra of sounds to perfection.
meanings.sent5: The postsyncing of the explosions made the action scenes even more thrilling.

meanings.definition: A technique used in film editing to ensure that dialogue matches the lip movements of actors.
meanings.sent1: Postsyncing is crucial to make sure the words spoken match the actors' lip movements.
meanings.sent2: In movies, postsyncing is used to sync up the dialogue with the actors' mouths.
meanings.sent3: The postsyncing process can lead to some hilarious bloopers if not done carefully.
meanings.sent4: Postsyncing is like a dance between the spoken words and the actors' lips.
meanings.sent5: The postsyncing of the romantic scene made the dialogue even more heartfelt.
